entry.content: At Gordius Technologies; we develop and implement algorithms within a novel software stack to process, analyze and act on streaming real-time data sources as well as static batch data sources. We currently use this technology on real-time data feeds from cryptocurrency exchanges to perform algorithmic trading, engaging in both market making and speculative trading.
